alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Del Norte Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 3:16AM PST until December 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte and Del Norte Interior. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest gusts will be restricted to high ridges and coastal headlands exposed to the south and east.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Del Norte Interior
